description: Initiate video upload session. Video duration should be between 10s and 60s (inclusive).

query.name: video_upload_id
query.description: The video_upload_id in the response of initiate_video_upload

query.name: part_seq
query.description: Sequence of the current part, starts from 0

query.name: part_content
query.description: The content of this part of file. Part size should be exactly 4MB, except last part of file.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/media_space/upload_video_part?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => array('part_content'=> new CURLFILE('/path/to/file') /* Replace with actual file path */),
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

curl --location --request POST 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/media_space/upload_video_part?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp' \
--form 'part_content=@"/path/to/file"'  #replace the sample path with your file path

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
